questions.question: In the word zero, of the counter element, _______ bit is set when the accumulated value of a count-down counter has reached the lowest possible accumulated value, which is -32,768. At This point, the counter will automatically wrap around and start counting down from the maximum negative value +32,767.

Statement 1:In order to reset a counter, the address of the reset instruction must match the address of counter that is to be reset.
Statement 2:Only one address is allowed per reset instruction.

answers.a: Statement 1 is true and Statement 2 is false
answers.b: Statement 1 and Statement 2 both are false
answers.c: Both Statement 1 and Statement 2 are true
